summary: Judas Priest is a super popular English heavy metal band formed in 1969. They've sold over 50 million albums and are considered one of the best metal bands ever. The band helped create the British heavy metal scene and influenced many other metal and rock genres. Their album "British Steel" made them famous in 1980. The band has had some changes in members over the years, but the core members have been together for a long time. Their style, with powerful vocals and twin guitars, has inspired many other bands. In 2022, they were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
title: Judas Priest
